items.title: Brit Premium by Nature Junior Small Breed
items.description: Brit Premium by Nature Junior Small Breed is a complete food for small breed puppies (1-12 months)
items.ingredients: Chicken 55% (dehydrated 30%, boneless 25%), chicken fat (preserved with mixed tocopherols), oats, wheat, salmon oil (2%), corn, dried apples, hydrolyzed chicken liver, brewer's yeast, collagen, shrimp shells (a source of glucosamine, 260 mg/kg), cartilage (a source of chondroitin, 180 mg/kg), herbs and fruits (clove, citrus, rosemary, turmeric, 150 mg/kg), mannan-oligosaccharides (150 mg/kg), fructo-oligosaccharides (100 mg/kg), Mojave yucca (100 mg/kg), dried chamomile (90 mg/kg), green-lipped mussel extract (as a source of glycosaminoglycans, 60 mg/kg), dried blueberries (60 mg/kg). Additives: vitamin A (3a672a) 20,000 IU, vitamin D3 (E671) 1200 IU, vitamin E (alpha-tocopherol) (3a700) 500 mg, biotin (3a880) 0.6 mg, choline chloride (3a890) 600 mg, zinc amino acid chelate (3b606) 90 mg, iron amino acid chelate hydrate (E1) 80 mg, manganese amino acid chelate hydrate (E5) 35 mg, potassium iodide (3b201) 0.65 mg, copper amino acid chelate hydrate (E4) 15 mg, organic form of selenium obtained from Saccharomyces cerevisiae CNCM I-3060 (3b8.10) 0.2 mg. Contains EU-approved antioxidants: tocopherol extracts from vegetable oils (1b306), ascorbyl palmitate (1b304), and rosemary extract.
items.content: Protein 32%, fat content 20%, moisture 10%, crude ash 6.8%, crude fiber 2%, calcium 1.5%, phosphorus 1.1%, omega-3 0.25%, omega-6 2.2%.

items.title: Acana Dog Puppy Large Breed
items.description: CHICKEN, LAYING EGGS, WILD HERRING, FRUITS, AND VEGETABLES - Acana Puppy Large Breed is a complete food for large breed puppies over 25 kg in adulthood. Cooked in our award-winning kitchens in Canada, Acana Puppy Large Breed is packed with fresh regional ingredients, free-run chicken and eggs, wild-caught herring, and sun-ripened fruits and vegetables. Everything is delivered fresh from our regions, bursting with great taste to keep your puppy happy, healthy, and strong.
items.ingredients: Fresh chicken (22%), chicken meal (21%), whole red lentils, whole green peas, fresh chicken giblets (liver, heart) (6%), herring meal (4%), eggs (4%), fresh freeze-dried mackerel (4%), fish oil (4%), whole chickpeas, pea fiber, pea starch, turkey meal (2.5%), whole green lentils, whole yellow peas, chicken fat (2%), fresh freeze-dried turkey liver (0.5%), salt, dried seaweed, whole fresh apples, whole fresh butternut squash, whole fresh carrots, whole fresh pears, whole fresh pumpkin, whole fresh zucchini, fresh kale, fresh spinach, fresh mustard greens, fresh turnip greens, whole fresh blueberries, whole fresh cranberries, whole fresh sea buckthorn berries, burdock root, lavender, marshmallow root, milk thistle, turmeric. Additives (per kg): Technological additives: tocopherol-rich extracts of natural origin: 121 mg, citric acid: 40 mg. Sensory additives: rosemary extract: 80 mg. Nutritional additives: 3a890 choline chloride (choline): 700 mg, 3b606 (zinc: 112.5 mg), 3b406 (copper: 11 mg), 3a821 vitamin B1: 25 mg, 3a841 vitamin B5: 8 mg, 3a831 vitamin B6: 7.5 mg, 3a700 vitamin E: 60 IU. Zootechnical additives: 4b1707 Enterococcus faecium NCIMB 10415 2.2x10^6 CFU.
items.content: Crude protein 33%, crude fat 15%, crude fiber 6%, crude ash 7%, moisture 12%, calcium 1.4%, phosphorus 1%, Omega-6 2.4%, Omega-3 1.2%, DHA/EPA 0.4%/0.4%.

items.title: Happy Dog Supreme Adult Medium 12 kg
items.description: Happy Dog Supreme Adult Medium is a complete food for adult dogs with a highly digestible recipe, ideal for dogs weighing between 11 and 25 kg with normal caloric needs.

Antioxidants based on vitamins: extract of natural origin, tocopherol, 6-palmitoyl-L-ascorbic acid.

items.title: Royal Canin Veterinary Diet Hypoallergenic
items.description: Royal Canin Veterinary Diet Hypoallergenic is a complete dietary food for adult dogs with hydrolyzed proteins of low molecular weight to ensure hypoallergenic nutrition.
items.ingredients: Rice, corn, animal fats, isolated soy protein*, hydrolyzed animal proteins, beet pulp, minerals, soy oil, vegetable fibers, fish oil, fructo-oligosaccharides, marigold extract (source of lutein). Additives (per kg): Nutritional additives: Vitamin A: 11600 IU, Vitamin D3: 1000 IU, E1 (Iron): 115 mg, E2 (Iodine): 4.3 mg, E5 (Manganese): 53 mg, E6 (Zinc): 212 mg, E8 (Selenium): 0.38 mg - Preservatives - Antioxidants.
items.content: Crude protein 21%, crude oils and fats 19%, crude ash 6.1%, crude fiber 1.1%. Per kg: essential fatty acids 42.7 g, EPA and DHA 3.3 g, omega-3 fatty acids 9.5 g.

items.title: Graf Barf Menu Plus Chicken, 2,5 kg
items.description: Suitable for dogs that gulp food or have dental issues. Graf Barf is 100% natural and ethologically adapted to the species. Regional ingredients from Germany are used in production (salmon and chicken from Switzerland - a salmonella-free country, and sprats from the North Sea). All ingredients are of human-grade quality, and there are no by-products. 100% free from additives, sugars, flavor enhancers, etc. All menus are monoprotein, meaning they contain only one source of protein. The food includes meat, bones, and offal (vegetables come from offal). The meat is cut into pieces, not industrially ground, and does not contain sharp bones that could injure the dog. It comes in the form of cubes measuring 2.5 cm in length and weighing approximately 15 g (bones come in larger pieces). Each ingredient has its own cube (meat, tripe, liver, heart, kidney, etc.). The cubes are manually sorted and packaged, so there may be variations in the blend ratio.
items.ingredients: Chicken necks, chicken carcasses, fruit and vegetable mix (apple, cucumber, cooked potato, herbs, beetroot, banana, zucchini, iceberg lettuce, carrot), chicken (finely chopped, mechanically deboned meat), chicken gizzards, chicken liver, chicken hearts.
items.content: Protein 14%, fat 10%, crude ash 2%, crude fiber 1%, moisture 73%.

items.title: Orijen Fit&Trim
items.description: Orijen Fit & Trim is a complete food for overweight adult dogs. Packed with nutritious meat proteins, the food contains proteins from free-run chicken and turkey, wild-caught fish, and free-range eggs delivered fresh in WholePrey ratios. With limited amounts of fat and carbohydrates, along with a unique combination of fibers from pumpkin, squash, and apple, Orijen Fit & Trim promotes optimal health for all adult dogs.
items.ingredients: Fresh chicken (25%), fresh whole herring (6%), fresh turkey (6%), fresh chicken liver, heart (6%), fresh whole flounder (5%), fresh whole mackerel (5%), fresh eggs (5%), chicken (dehydrated, 4%), mackerel (dehydrated, 4%), sardine (dehydrated, 4%), herring (dehydrated, 4%), turkey (dehydrated, 4%), whitefish (dehydrated, 4%), lentil fiber, whole pinto beans, whole navy beans, whole chickpeas, whole red lentils, whole green lentils, whole green peas, pea starch, fresh turkey liver (1.5%), chicken fat (1.5%), apple fiber, dried seaweed, dried brown kelp, fresh whole pumpkin, fresh whole butternut squash, fresh whole zucchini, fresh whole parsnips, fresh carrots, fresh whole Red Delicious apples, fresh whole Bartlett pears, freeze-dried liver (chicken and turkey) (0.1%), fresh whole cranberries, fresh whole blueberries, chicory root, turmeric root, milk thistle, burdock root, lavender, marshmallow root, rosehips. Technological additives: Tocopherol-rich extract of natural origin. Zootechnical additives: Enterococcus faecium NCIMB10415: 600x10^6 CFU.
items.content: Crude protein 40%, crude fat 13%, crude ash 8%, crude fiber 8%, moisture 12%, calcium 1.4%, phosphorus 1.1%, Omega-6 fatty acids 2.2%, Omega-3 fatty acids 0.9%, DHA/EPA 0.25%/0.15%.

items.title: Profine Adult Lamb
items.description: Profine Adult Lamb is a complete food for adult dogs of all breeds. It is easily digestible and highly efficient. It does not cause allergic reactions or food intolerance. Organic zinc promotes a shiny and healthy coat, while organic selenium and vitamin E protect cells from aging.
items.ingredients: Lamb 35%, potatoes 25%, corn, chicken fat (preserved with mixed tocopherols, a source of vitamin E), dried apples, brewer's yeast, hydrolyzed chicken liver, shrimp 1.5%, salmon oil 1%, seaweed 0.5%, glucosamine sulfate 0.02%, inulin from chicory root (a source of mannan-oligosaccharides) 0.018%, plant mixture (fennel, basil, sage) 0.018%, fructooligosaccharides 0.012%, yucca schidigera extract 0.01%, chondroitin sulfate extract 0.012%, marigold extract 0.01%. items.content: Crude protein 25%, crude fat 13%, crude fiber 3%, moisture 10%, crude ash 6.8%, calcium 1.6%, phosphorus 1.2%, Omega-3 fatty acids 0.22%, Omega-6 fatty acids 1.28%. ME: 3,700 kcal/kg.

items.title: Taste of the Wild Pacific Stream Salmon
items.description: This egg-free recipe derives all its animal proteins from fish, which means it is rich in omega fatty acids that help maintain healthy skin and a shiny coat. The unique flavors of smoked salmon, vegetables, legumes, and fruits provide appropriate levels of nutrients for overall health and vitality of adult dogs.
items.ingredients: Salmon (21%), fish meal, sweet potatoes, potatoes, peas, canola oil, lentils, salmon meal, smoked salmon (4%), potato fiber, minerals, dried chicory root, tomatoes, blueberries, raspberries, yucca schidigera extract.

Trixie krevet za pse Lona 60x50 cm rozo/sivi
items.description: Trixie Lona krevet za pse napravljen je od tkanine, ima navlaku od poliestera i punjenje od poliesterskog flisa. Stabilnog je oblika zahvaljujući punjenju velike gustoće. Ima dvostrani unutarnji jastuk s uklonjivom navlakom koja je periva u perilici rublja, dok se ostalo može prati isključivo ručno. Ima protuklizno dno. Dimenzije kreveta: 60 x 50 cm

items.title: Trixie ležaj za pse Gino 70x45 cm
items.description: Trixie Gino udoban je i mekani ležaj za tvog ljubimca. Izrađen je od pliša što ga čini toplim, a punjen je materijalom od poliestera debljine 8-14 cm za dodatni komfor. Vrlo je lagan pa je idealan za prijenos ili kao ležaj prilikom transporta. Boja ležaja je bež s efektnim motivima šapa pa se lako uklapa u svaki prostor. Presvlaka se može odvojiti i periva je na 30°. Dimenzije: 70x45 cm

items.title: Trixie ležaj za pse Tammy fi 50
items.description: Mekani pliš; Pokrivka od poliestera; Punjenje od poliestera; Pranje isključivo ručno

items.title: Trixie ležaj Harvey fi-60 cm bijelo-crni
items.description: Trixie Harvey jastuk za pse udobno je i mekano utočište za odmaranje Vašeg ljubimca. Ovaj čupavi ležaj zahvaljujući dugim plišanim vlaknima djeluje smirujuće na ljubimce. Zbog estetski ugodnog i privlačnog izgleda lako se uklapa u svaki ambijent. Dno je protuklizno. Presvlaka se da skinuti te je periva na 30°C u perilici, a unutrašnji dio preporuča se prati ručno.

items.title: Trixie ležaj za pse Junior zeko fi-40 cm svjetlosiva/lila
items.description: Trixie Junior ležaj najmjenjen je za štence ili pse malih pasmina. Napravljen je od pliša, navlaka od poliestera i punjenje od poliesterskog flisa. Ima protuklizno dno. Dimenzije jastuka: promjer 40 cm

items.title: Trixie jastuk za pse Harvey 140x90 cm bijelo/crni
items.description: Trixie Harvey jastuk za pse nudi optimalnu udobnost zahvaljujući mekanoj navlaci s dugodlakim plišom koja se može lako ukloniti kad je vrijeme za čišćenje. Idealan je za srednje i velike pasmine. Dno je protuklizno za bolju stabilnost. Uklonjiva navlaka može se prati u perilici rublja dok punjenje isključivo ručno. Dimenzije jastuka: 140 x 90 cm

items.title: Ferplast ležaj za pse Dandy 45 pamuk
items.description: Ferplast Dandy je podstavljeni krevet ovalnog oblika za pse i mačke s presvlakom od pamučne tkanine. Ima visoke bočne stijenke i niži je na ulaznoj strani. Unutarnji jastuk je uključen. Jastuk se po potrebi može ukloniti radi lakšeg održavanja i čišćenja. Ležaj je moguće oprati u perilici na 30°. Dimenzije: 45 x 35 x 13 cm

items.title: Ferplast ležaj za pse Tommy 65 smeđi
items.description: Podstavljeni ležaj od baršuna i izdržljive tkanine ​za pse u kompletu s uklonjivim jastukom u obliku srca. Prikladan je za male i srednje pse. Izrađen od robusne tkanine otporne na habanje, efekt tvida. Otvoren na dvije strane za lakši pristup. Udobni nasloni. Podstavljeni madrac presvučen tkaninom za dodatnu udobnost. Dvostrani jastučić u obliku srca s jednom stranom od tkanine i jednom od baršuna. Može se prati u perilici na 30°C. Dimenzije ležaja: 56 x 32 cm

items.title: Hudog jastuk za pse s jastukom letters S
items.description: Ležaj ima pripadajući jastuk u obliku kosti koji se po potrebi može maknuti. Ljubimci vole staviti glavu na povišeni dio. Vanjska navlaka jastuka se lako skida zahvaljujući patentnom zatvaraču i održavanje je jednostavno. Jastuk je izrađen od tkanine Dakota (čvrsta dekor pamučna tkanina otpornija na habanje).Ovaj lagani jastuk možete nositi sa sobom na putovanja kako bi vašem ljubimcu bilo ugodnije. Navlaka za jastuk je periva u perilici rublja na 60°. Sušenje u sušilici (delikatan mod). Dimenzije jastuka: 60 x 40 x 14 cm.

items.title: Trixie ležaj za pse Tammy fi 70
items.description: Mekani pliš. Pokrivka od poliestera. Punjenje od poliestera. Pranje isključivo ručno.

items.title: Trixie igračka za pse božićna sob tkanina 42 cm smeđi/sivi, 1 komad
items.description: Trixie božična igračka za pse u obliku soba napravljena je od izdržljive tkanine sa zvukom kako bi privukla pažnju ljubimca te pružila sate interaktivne zabave. Te igračke nisu za žvakanje i nisu neuništive. Igre pod nadzorom pomoći će igračkama da duže traju. Savršen je poklon za Vašeg ljubimca ispod božičnog drvca.

items.title: Trixie igračka za pse Activity Chess 40x27 cm
items.description: Strateška igra s 4 čunja, raznim udubljenjima i ladicama. Neklizajuća podloga zbog gumenih nogu. Materijal: plastika. Upute za trening.

items.title: Trixie igračka za pse Activity Snack roll 14 cm
items.description: Trixie igračka za pse Activity Snack roll savršena je igračka za aktivnost vašeg ljubimca. Jednostavno otvorite poklopac i napunite igračku omiljenim poslasticama. Unutar igračke nalaze se 3 šipke koje se mogu mijenjati kako bi se regulirala brzina puštanja poslastica.

items.title: Trixie igračka za pse prsten s tenis lopticom fi-18 cm
items.description: Trixie igračka prsten s tenis lopticom prikladna je igračka za povlačenje i potezanje, odlična za interaktivnu igru s tvojim ljubimcem. Materijal: pamuk, poliester. Promjer igračke: ø 6 cm / ø 18 cm

items.title: Trixie igračka za pse Dentafun gumena kost mintfresh 11 cm
items.description: Prirodna guma. Idealna kod štenaca prilikom izmjene zubi. Okus mente. Za njegu zubi i desni.

items.title: Trixie igračka za pse jutena rola za zagriz 25 cm
items.description: Trixie igračka za pse jutena rola za zagriz ljepljena je igračka napravljena od jute s ručkama.

items.title: Trixie igračka Lick`n`Snack pladanj TPR/PP 20x20 cm
items.description: Igračka za poslastice. Lizanje smiruje Vašeg kućnog ljubimca i osigurava mirna razdoblja. Nizak unos poslastica u dužem razdoblju aktivnosti - može se puniti pastama, mokrom hranom ili jogurtom. Napunite poslasticom i zamrznite za osvježavajuće iznenađenje.

items.title: Trixie igračka za pse Latex Pig koji rokče 23 cm
items.description: Materijal: lateks. Sa izvornim životinjskim zvukom (roktanje). Dužina: 23 cm.

items.title: Trixie igračka za pse Pliš 4 figure 17 cm
items.description: Trixie igračka za pse pliš 4 figure sa špagom je mekana i robusna igračka za pse sa zvukom. Dimenzija igračke: 17 cm.

items.title: Kong igračka za pse Classic XX-Large
items.description: Kong igračke izrađene su od izdržljive prirodne gume. Zbog svoje kvalitete preporuka su veterinara i trenera pasa diljem svijeta.

items.title: Trixie ručnik za pse i mačke 50x60 cm sivi
items.description: Trixie ručnik za pse i mačke od mikrofibre, veličina 50 x 60 cm.

items.title: Trixie zaštitna krema za šape psa pčelinji vosak, 50 ml
items.description: Trixie krema za njegu šapa pasa i mačaka sadrži pčelinji vosak koji štiti mekuši i šape od pucanja te umiruje već nastale iritacije i pukotine. Posebno se preporuča u zimskom periodu prilikom leda i soli za posipavanje cesti. Također, vrlo je korisna za korištenje u ljetnom periodu prilikom vrućeg asfalta i u blizini mora zbog čestog kontakta sa soli. Moguće ju je koristiti tijekom cijele godine prilikom dugih šetnji na hrapavim površinama.

items.title: Trixie kozmetičke maramice na prst, za uši 50 kom
Trixie Dental set pasta/četkica/navlaka za prst
Trixie četka Instyle drvena drška jednostrana 18x10 cm
items.description: Za kratku do srednje dugu ravnu, srednje dugu do dugu, oštru i kovrčavu dlaku

items.title: Trixie šampon za pse za bijelo/svijetlo krzno 250 ml
items.description: Pomaže poboljšati prirodnu boju dlake i daje joj sjajni izgled. Nakon pranja, dlaka vašeg psa će izgledati zdravo i ugodno će mirišati!

items.title: Trixie regenerator za pse Jojoba, 250 ml
items.description: Trixie regenerator za pse s uljem jojobe pružit će krznu tvog ljubimca svilenkasti sjaj i njegovani izgled. Prikladan je i za dugodlake pse kod kojih olakšava raščešljavanje.

items.title: Trixie sprej za raščešljavanje pasa 175 ml
items.description: Trixie sprej za raščešljavanje pasa je bez mirisa i ne masti dlaku. Olakšava svakodnevno češljanje i omekšava dlaku. Sadrži formulu koja odbija prašinu, prljavštinu i vodu. Prikladan je i za primjenu kod dugodlakih pasa.

items.title: Ferplast kliješta za nokte, za pse
Inodorina šampon za suho pranje Mousse Talcum, 300 ml
items.description: Inodorina šampon za suho pranje u obliku pjene idealan je za svakodnevno održavanje higijene krzna pasa, mačaka, štenaca i mačića bez primjene vode. Blaga formula uz nježan miris pudera dubinski čisti i štiti krzno i kožu te održava prirodni pH kože. Nakon pranja dlaka ostaje sjajna i mirisna dulje vrijeme. Primjena: Dobro protresite prije upotrebe. Nježno utrljajte pjenu u krzno ljubimca dok se potpuno ne upije. Iščetkajte da se ravnomjerno raspodjeli po krznu.
